methods.description: Begin using simulated time for testing

parameters.name: new_simulated_time
parameters.description: The simulated time to start with

parameters.name: delta_time_seconds
parameters.description: How far in the future to advance the time

parameters.name: unit
parameters.description: The unit of time ("seconds", "blocks", or "rounds")

methods.description: wait for specified amount of time

parameters.name: wait_time
parameters.description: time in seconds to wait before accepting more input

methods.description: Don't return until the specified block has arrived

parameters.name: block_number
parameters.description: The block number (or offset) to wait for

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Whether to wait for an "absolute" block number, or a count of blocks "relative" to the current block number

parameters.name: wait_time_in_block_intervals
parameters.description: time in block intervals to wait before accepting more input

methods.description: enables or disables output from the CLI

parameters.name: enable_flag
parameters.description: true to enable output, false to disable it

methods.description: prevents printing any times or other unpredictable data

parameters.name: enable_flag
parameters.description: true to enable filtering, false to disable it

methods.description: returns a list of notable errors

parameters.name: first_error_number
parameters.description: the first error to list

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: the maximum number of errors to return

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: the filename to save json error list to

methods.description: returns a list of short summaries of notable errors

parameters.name: first_error_number
parameters.description: the first error to list

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: the maximum number of errors to return

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: the filename to save json error list to

methods.description: writes a list of notable errors to a file

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Where to dump the log file

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: time of the first error

methods.description: clears the specified errors from the log

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: time of the first error

parameters.name: first_error_number
parameters.description: the first error to erase

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: the maximum number of errors to erase

methods.description: updates logging configuration (level, etc) based on settings in config.json
Returns call timings for node_delegate callbacks
Adds up delegate votes using balances, and reports any discrepancies with the stored values in the database
Returns client's debug name specified in config.json

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: the number of the first key, or -1 to suppress suffix

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: the number of keys to generate

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.description: a string prefix added to the seed used to generate keys

parameters.name: import
parameters.description: whether to import generated keys

parameters.name: account_name
parameters.description: the name of the account the key should be imported into, if null then the key must belong to an active account

parameters.name: create_new_account
parameters.description: If true, the wallet will attempt to create a new account for the name provided rather than import the key into an existing account

parameters.name: rescan
parameters.description: If true, the wallet will rescan the blockchain looking for transactions that involve this private key
